metaDescription: Remix reference art into new variations while keeping composition locked. bestmaker ai lets you upload intro/outro frames, blend transitions, and preserve brand DNA.

overview.title: Bring moodboards to life with controlled edits
overview.body: Upload reference shots, describe the transformation you want, and bestmaker ai handles image uploads, retries, and job tracking. Perfect for refining characters, packaging, and UI states without repainting from scratch.

points.title: Multi-reference aware
points.description: Use up to eight frames to guide lighting, composition, and color palettes.

points.title: Upload resilience
points.description: Automatic retries and status feedback ensure every reference lands before you submit.

points.title: Private iterations
points.description: Keep repaints internal or publish public case studies with a single switch.

seo.title: bestmaker ai for brand refreshes and rapid prototyping
seo.body: Creative, product, and packaging teams rely on bestmaker ai to align exploration with stakeholder feedback. Library-friendly exports and multilingual prompts help you reuse assets across global launches.
highlights: Reference grid uploader with preview/removal controls.
Track credits, history, and share status per job for governance.
Fresh variations boost SEO through unique imagery and increased engagement.
